title: Allow per-repo worktree setup config
description:
Add support for per-repo configuration that runs when a new worktree is created.

Use case: Copy files like '.env' from the main worktree to new worktrees automatically.

Possible implementation:
- Add a config file (e.g., .ccw/setup.yaml or in ccw config)
- Support file copy patterns (e.g., copy .env, .env.local)
- Run after worktree creation but before tmux session starts
